flavor: We Never Sleep.

flavor: It is essential to liberate a populace from tyranny before that tyranny takes root.

flavor: "Trust me. I know what I'm doing."

flavor: "With distributed systems, assets can be realigned with no loss of efficiency." -William Knuth, The Tower of Babbage

text: When your turn begins, you may move an advancement token from a piece of ice to an installed piece of ice that can be advanced.

flavor: "This is a one-of-a-kind opportunity…"

flavor: Future leaders start here.

flavor: No one on the board knows everyone on it.

text:
Each agenda in the Runner's score area is worth 1 fewer agenda point.

flavor: His belt of stone did shake and shatter.

flavor: As through the door of light he came.

flavor: Anything worth doing is worth doing twice.

text: Whenever the Runner passes a rezzed piece of ice protecting this server, you may reveal and trash another copy of that ice from HQ to force the Runner to encounter the piece of ice just passed again.

flavor: Have you tried turning it off and on again?

Use these credits to install ice protecting this server.

flavor: "Everyone deserves a chance. Everyone."

Draw 3 cards.

flavor: No one knows what they want-least of all them.

text: Run R&D. If successful, when you breach R&D, access cards from the bottom of R&D instead of the top.

text: Run HQ. If successful, instead of breaching HQ, you may spend any number of [click] to force the Corp to trash that many cards from HQ at random.

flavor: "Hello thank you for vidding MegaBuy I'm Carol how can I help you."

text:
As an additional cost to play this event, spend [click][click][click].
Gain 10[credit].

text: Run any server. The first time you fully break a sentry during that run, trash that sentry.
title: Forked

title: Knifed

text: Run any server. The first time you fully break a code gate during that run, trash that code gate.

flavor: Nom nom nom.
stripped_text: Interface -> 1click: Break 1 subroutine. You cannot access cards for the remainder of this run. 1click: +1 strength.
text: Interface -> 1[click]: Break 1 subroutine. You cannot access cards for the remainder of this run. 1[click]: +1 strength.
title: Eater

flavor: "Once your sniffer finds the protocols the server uses to trash its own data, you can spoof those same protocols. It's quite the show." -Ji "Noise" Reilly
stripped_text: Whenever an installed Corp card is trashed, place 1 virus counter on Gravedigger. click, hosted virus counter: The Corp trashes the top card of R&D.
text: Whenever an installed Corp card is trashed, place 1 virus counter on Gravedigger. [click], hosted virus counter: The Corp trashes the top card of R&D.
title: Gravedigger

flavor: "We built the network. But then the network evolved. Can we be sure that it is not alive?" -g00ru
stripped_text: When you install this program, place 1 virus counter on it. Each other virus program is considered to have 1 additional hosted virus counter for each virus counter on this program. You can spend hosted virus counters as if they were hosted on any other installed virus program.
text: When you install this program, place 1 virus counter on it. Each other virus program is considered to have 1 additional hosted virus counter for each virus counter on this program. You can spend hosted virus counters as if they were hosted on any other installed virus program.
title: Hivemind

stripped_text: You can install virus programs onto this program. Limit 1 hosted program. The memory cost of the hosted program does not count against your memory limit. Interrupt -> Whenever virus counters would be purged, prevent 1 virus counter on the hosted program from being removed.
text: You can install virus programs onto this program. Limit 1 hosted program. The memory cost of the hosted program does not count against your memory limit. [interrupt] -> Whenever virus counters would be purged, prevent 1 virus counter on the hosted program from being removed.
title: Progenitor

flavor: A black box that makes data disappear forever.
stripped_text: Interrupt -> Whenever you would access a card in Archives, you may instead remove it from the game. Use this ability only once each time you breach Archives.
text: [interrupt] -> Whenever you would access a card in Archives, you may instead remove it from the game. Use this ability only once each time you breach Archives.
title: Archives Interface

flavor: There was a sickly smell coming from his closet. He hoped it was only a mouse this time.
stripped_text: When your turn begins, you may trash another of your installed cards. If you do, draw 1 card or remove 1 tag.
text: When your turn begins, you may trash another of your installed cards. If you do, draw 1 card or remove 1 tag.
title: Chop Bot 3000

flavor: "The trick is remembering which virus you loaded onto which strip. That's why I draw emoji on 'em. Then I just have to remember which emoji stands for which virus." -Princess Space Kitten
stripped_text: +3 mu Use the MU on MemStrips only for virus programs.
text: +3[mu] Use the MU on MemStrips only for virus programs.
title: MemStrips

flavor: "Show me your faith without deeds, if you can."
stripped_text: +1 mu When your turn begins, draw 1 card if the Corp has cards in HQ equal to his or her maximum hand size. Limit 1 console per player.
text: +1[mu] When your turn begins, draw 1 card if the Corp has cards in HQ equal to his or her maximum hand size. Limit 1 console per player.
title: Vigil

flavor: "They showed me that I wasn't broken. I am still a whole human, no matter how many limbs I lose. The golems are our enemy, as well as anyone who values efficiency and profit more than a human life." -Edward Kim
stripped_text: Whenever an agenda is scored or stolen, gain credits equal to the agenda points on that agenda.
text: Whenever an agenda is scored or stolen, gain credits equal to the agenda points on that agenda.
title: Human First

flavor: Her heart beat faster as her reader illuminated the records. It was all there. The pod had not been reprogrammed since the 14th, which meant that this was a case of gross negligence.
stripped_text: Install only if the Corp has at least 1 bad publicity. click,click,click,click,trash: Give the Corp 1 bad publicity.
text:
Install only if the Corp has at least 1 bad publicity.
[click],[click],[click],[click],[trash]: Give the Corp 1 bad publicity.
title: Investigative Journalism

flavor: "Don't worry, me. You won't have to vertical park." -Ji "Noise" Reilly
stripped_text: trash: Prevent all damage. Trash all installed hardware, all installed non-virtual resources, and all cards in your grip. Lose all credits in your credit pool. Remove all tags.
text: [trash]: Prevent all damage. Trash all installed hardware, all installed non-virtual resources, and all cards in your grip. Lose all credits in your credit pool. Remove all tags.
title: Sacrificial Clone

flavor: Her eyes were the color of dreams and disasters.
stripped_text: When your turn begins, if there are 2 or more power counters on Stim Dealer, remove all power counters from it and suffer 1 brain damage (cannot be prevented); otherwise, place 1 power counter on Stim Dealer and gain click.
text: When your turn begins, if there are 2 or more power counters on Stim Dealer, remove all power counters from it and suffer 1 brain damage (cannot be prevented); otherwise, place 1 power counter on Stim Dealer and gain [click].
title: Stim Dealer

flavor: Scraps of code drifting around the network can congeal into pools of data. Within this primordial soup the code breaks, re-assembles, mutates. Evolves.
stripped_text: When your turn begins, place 1 virus counter on Virus Breeding Ground. click: Move 1 virus counter on Virus Breeding Ground to another card with at least 1 virus counter on it.
text:
When your turn begins, place 1 virus counter on Virus Breeding Ground.
[click]: Move 1 virus counter on Virus Breeding Ground to another card with at least 1 virus counter on it.
title: Virus Breeding Ground

flavor: Runner software is notoriously scratch-built and under-tested, and the shadow net has no tech support. It works, mostly, but sometimes a fresh install is just the ticket.
stripped_text: Add an installed program or piece of hardware to your grip.
text: Add an installed program or piece of hardware to your grip.
title: Uninstall

stripped_text: When your turn begins, you may lose click. If you do, prevent the first tag you would take until your next turn begins.
text: When your turn begins, you may lose [click]. If you do, prevent the first tag you would take until your next turn begins.
title: Qianju PT

flavor: "Sometimes I like to make origami cranes out of old newsrags. It helps me think, putting it back on the subconscious. I figure it's the same principle for my rig – keep it busy and it makes me a few creds for my trouble." -Quetzal
stripped_text: When your turn begins, gain 1 credit if you have 2 or more unused MU.
text: When your turn begins, gain 1[credit] if you have 2 or more unused MU.
title: Data Folding
